nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: Hello adventurer and welcome! You probably have many questions.

choices.text: I have a question. How are you?
Where am I? Where are my friends?

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: Hah! That's very polite of you. I love it. I am fine and how are you?

choices.text: I am fine too. But an explanation of what is going on would be appreciated.
I will be fine, when I get out and find my friends

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: Your friends are trapped, just like you, inside the mind of a powerful deamon

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: Yes, this is unreal. All of it.

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: The only way out is through the multiple parts of the mind of the deamon. Till he releases the illusion. I'll help you a bit.

choices.text: Who are you and why are helping me?

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: I worked for the deamon, don't judge, I was young. But the guy did not pay me...

nodes.speaker: Bob
nodes.text: Follow the path, push the red button, reach the portal on the far island. Be prepared for a small battle.
